title: In front of Evin Prison, 6 July, Tehran, Iran
description:
Families of imprisoned protesters demonstrate outside of Evin Prison. July 6, 2009.

Evin Prison is a facility notorious for holding and executing prisoners of conscience. Prisoners face daily "interrogations", in the form of beatings, waterboardings with hot water, and in some cases being raped with glass bottles which are then broken inside them.

If you want to help, join us at http://iran.whyweprotest.net/

The master list of Anonymous's Iran videos is located at http://gonzotimes.net/?page_id=500
